channel.title: NPR Programs: Morning Edition
channel.description: Morning Edition takes listeners around the country and the world with multi-faceted stories and commentaries every weekday. Hosts Steve Inskeep, Leila Fadel, Michel Martin and A Martínez bring you the latest breaking news and features to prepare you for the day.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Trump confirms U.S. military strike on dock in Venezuela
item.description: President Trump confirmed a recent U.S. strike on a Venezuelan dock he claims was used by drug smugglers, prompting questions about the size and scope of the U.S. mission.
item.content:encoded: President Trump confirmed a recent U.S. strike on a Venezuelan dock he claims was used by drug smugglers, prompting questions about the size and scope of the U.S. mission.
item.dc:creator: Franco Ordoñez

item.title: Former counterterrorism official talks about U.S. strike on Venezuelan dock
item.description: NPR's A Martinez speaks to Phil Mudd, a former counterterrorism official in the CIA and FBI, about a U.S. strike on a Venezuelan dock that the Trump administration alleges was used for drug smuggling.
item.content:encoded: NPR's A Martinez speaks to Phil Mudd, a former counterterrorism official in the CIA and FBI, about a U.S. strike on a Venezuelan dock that the Trump administration alleges was used for drug smuggling.
item.dc:creator: A Martínez

item.title: Israel bans dozens of aid groups from Gaza, despite immense needs
item.description: Dozens of international aid groups, like Doctors Without Borders, are now banned from entering Gaza under new rules set by Israel.
item.content:encoded: Dozens of international aid groups, like Doctors Without Borders, are now banned from entering Gaza under new rules set by Israel.
item.dc:creator: Aya Batrawy

item.title: In one year, Trump pivots fentanyl response from public health to drug war
item.description: Experts say Biden's focus on addiction health care saved tens of thousands of lives and slowed fentanyl smuggling. Trump scrapped Biden's approach in favor of military strikes.
item.content:encoded:
Experts say Biden's focus on addiction health care saved tens of thousands of lives and slowed fentanyl smuggling. Trump scrapped Biden's approach in favor of military strikes.

(Image credit: Anna Moneymaker)
item.dc:creator: Brian Mann

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: Trump says the U.S. military conducted a strike on a Venezuelan dock he claims was used by drug smugglers, protests over economy flood Iran, flu cases in the U.S are on the rise, CDC data shows.
item.content:encoded: Trump says the U.S. military conducted a strike on a Venezuelan dock he claims was used by drug smugglers, protests over economy flood Iran, flu cases in the U.S are on the rise, CDC data shows.
item.dc:creator: Michel Martin

item.title: Remembering the musicians we lost in 2025
item.description: From Sly Stone of the Family Stone to Ozzy Osbourne, we remember some of the musicians lost in 2025.
item.content:encoded: From Sly Stone of the Family Stone to Ozzy Osbourne, we remember some of the musicians lost in 2025.
item.dc:creator: A Martínez

item.title: New York Times reporter talks about exclusive interviews with Marjorie Taylor Greene
item.description: NPR's Michel Martin speaks with the New York Times' Robert Draper about his exclusive interviews with Republican Congresswoman Marjorie Taylor Greene.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Michel Martin speaks with the New York Times' Robert Draper about his exclusive interviews with Republican Congresswoman Marjorie Taylor Greene.
item.dc:creator: Michel Martin

item.title: Bangladesh mourns death of first female Prime Minister Khaleda Zia
item.description: Bangladesh is mourning the death of its first female Prime Minister, Khaleda Zia, who died Tuesday.
item.content:encoded: Bangladesh is mourning the death of its first female Prime Minister, Khaleda Zia, who died Tuesday.
item.dc:creator: Diaa Hadid

item.title: Netflix hit 'Stranger Things' ends on New Year's Eve
item.description: After nearly 10 years, the Netflix hit "Stranger Things" is ending. The series finale, which clocks in at just over two hours, drops on New Year's Eve.
item.content:encoded: After nearly 10 years, the Netflix hit "Stranger Things" is ending. The series finale, which clocks in at just over two hours, drops on New Year's Eve.
item.dc:creator: Linda Holmes

item.title: In one North Carolina town, the New Year's Eve pickle drop is brined into its history
item.description: Across the country, cities and towns have New Year's Eve drops that feature everything from New York City's crystal ball to a favorite product made by the people of Mt. Olive, North Carolina.
item.content:encoded: Across the country, cities and towns have New Year's Eve drops that feature everything from New York City's crystal ball to a favorite product made by the people of Mt. Olive, North Carolina.
item.dc:creator: Nick de la Canal
